Text.Page:
A plan is a lot like a fount, don't you think?

I mean, the parts that make it up sort of pour from a spout...and...erm...

Well, that fell apart fast, didn't it.

Anyway, ask me if you need help with anything.
Would you like to leave?<TEXTBUTTON>"I'll take your help."</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>Exit Aura.</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
